mapper.insert: insert into product(pr_code, pr_ca_name, pr_name, pr_thumb, pr_content, pr_price) values(#{pr_code}, #{pr_ca_name}, #{pr_name}, #{pr_thumb}, #{pr_content}, #{pr_price})
mapper.update: update category set ca_count = ca_count+1 where ca_name = #{ca_name}
mapper.select: select count(*) from product where (pr_name like concat('%',#{search},'%') or pr_code like concat('%',#{search},'%')) and pr_ca_name like concat('%',#{pr_ca_name},'%')
